## WebsocketStreamDefinition interface

Definition for a WebSocket-based stream.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface WebsocketStreamDefinition<TRequest, TRaw, TResponse> extends StreamBaseConfig<TRequest, TRaw, TResponse> 
```
